Movie finder

Often I want to remember the name of the film, where it was this and that. Now it is possible!

Just enter the words in the search bar and all the films will be selected where in the title (or in the description) there are words that sound similar to those you are looking for.

  • Movies

    • Here are all the available films, with a long press you can mark the film as selected. You can search / filter.          With a simple tap you can open detailed information about the film. Sorted first by probability of matching search phrase and then by name

  • Favorites

    • Here is a list of films you have selected, regardless of the search options

  • Settings

    • Only relevant - in the list of films will be ONLY those in which there are searched words

    Search in the movie description - search not only in the title, but also in the movie description

    Pause between page loading - the specified pause will be maintained between page loading

    Updating the list of films - you can configure whether it will happen only with WiFi connection
Here appear messages about the completion of the download and reminders of the movie
